questions.question_text:
After deploying vRealize Operations, an administrator needs to configure cost drivers to accurately reflect the purchase price and date of all nodes within the VMware vSAN cluster that are being monitored.
Which type of cost driver should the administrator select?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
For me it A What-If Analysis : https://docs.vmware.com/en/vRealize-Operations/8.10/com.vmware.vcom.core.doc/GUID-2D2A0CA2-FA40-4D15-AC1B-C2435A63E33A.html

questions.question_text:
An administrator is using vRealize Operations for capacity modeling to determine how many more ESXi servers are needed to increase time remaining and capacity remaining score.
What can be used to accomplish this goal?
At which frequency are new services discovered when using Service Discovery in vRealize Operations?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Its B its running every 24h

questions.question_text:
An administrator deployed vRealize Operations and has been tasked with ensuring that the VMware SDDC remains compliant to the VMware vSphere Security Configuration Guide. The compliance benchmark is showing that the VMware SDDC is not completely compliant to the standards.
Which three symptoms could have triggered a compliance alert? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AEF
AEF, checked in hardening guide:
https://core.vmware.com/vmware-vsphere-7-security-configuration-guide

comments.content: I think AEF is the correct.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACF
I think its correct according the hardening document.

choices.D: The Enable 3D Support setting for the Virtual Machine is set to FALSE.
choices.E: The Disable console copy operation for a Virtual Machine is set to FALSE.
choices.A: The lockdown mode on a vSphere ESXi host is set to Disabled.
choices.F: The Forged Transmit policy is set to allow on a Distributed Port Group.
choices.C: The SNMP service on a vSphere ESXi host is set to Disabled.
choices.B: Transparent Page Sharing is Disabled on a virtual machine.

questions.question_text:
An administrator has been tasked with configuring vRealize Operations to ensure that workload performance across the VMware SDDC is the main priority. In the event of an issue, remediation activities should be automatically completed to minimize any impact to running workloads. A maximum of 10% cluster resources should be reserved for burst capacity.
Which option should the administrator configure to meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
I think its C operational intent
